original: Nibbānaṁ tāṇaṁ leṇaṁ saraṇaṁ parāyaṇaṁ accutaṁ amatanti?
analyzed: nibbānam tāṇam leṇam saraṇam parāyaṇam accutam
gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārassa patti asaṅkhatā ati
gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārassa patti asaṅkhatā nibbānam asaṅkhatanti
gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārassa patti asaṅkhatā nibbānam asaṅkhatanti

original: Paṭhamassa jhānassa patti asaṅkhatā (evaṁ sabbaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ) dutiyassa jhānassa …
analyzed: paṭhamassa jhānassa patti asaṅkhatā evam sabbam vitthāretabba dutiyassa jhānassa
arahatta phalassa patti asaṅkhatā nibbānam asaṅkhatanti
